definition: hegemon/tyrant/lord/feudal chief/to rule by force/to usurp/(in modern advertising) master
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: A Tyrannosaurus rex model at the Natural History Museum in London.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦自然歷史博物館的霸王龍模型。
霸王龍的行爲舉止什麼樣？

sentences.english: But T. rex's tail was unique.
sentences.chinese: 霸王龍的尾部是獨一無二的。

sentences.english: Other dinosaurs that lived at the same time were Tyrannosaurus Rex and Deinonychus.
sentences.chinese: 其它生活在這個時期的恐龍有霸王龍和恐爪龍。

sentences.english: The discovery overturns scientists' thinking about how Tyrannosaurus rex evolved.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現推翻了科學家們對霸王龍進化過程的假設。

sentences.english: But it was rather smaller than Tyrannosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 但這種動物比霸王龍小一些。

sentences.english: Tyrannosaurus Rex may have been a cannibal, new evidence suggests.
sentences.chinese: 有新證據證明霸王龍可能會自相殘殺。

sentences.english: The brain of the T-Rex was large. It was a smart dinosaur.
sentences.chinese: 霸王龍的腦袋很大，它是隻聰明的恐龍。

sentences.english: “The bicep alone—and this is a conservative estimate—could curl 430 pounds,” Conrad says.
sentences.chinese: 保守估計，霸王龍的二頭肌有430磅的曲力。

sentences.english: Scant tyrannosauroid teeth and scraps of bone had previously been found in the Southwest.
sentences.chinese: 在西南地區很缺乏霸王龍類的牙齒和骨骼碎片。

sentences.english: “The T. rex probably couldn’t have done the arm-wrestling move, ” Conrad says. “So maybe you could get him on a technicality.”
sentences.chinese: 霸王龍學不會摔跤的招數，也許你能在這上面贏過它。

sentences.english: The center showcases realistic, moving Tyrannosaurus and Triceratops dinosaurs.
sentences.chinese: 該中心展示了現實，移動霸王龍和三角龍恐龍。

sentences.english: Indeed, before T. rex hit the scene, tyrannosaurs were relatively petite.
sentences.chinese: 在霸王龍出現之前，暴龍類的成員是比較嬌小的一羣。

sentences.english: “The T. rex probably couldn’t have done the arm-wrestling move,” Conrad says. “So maybe you could get him on a technicality。”
sentences.chinese: 霸王龍學不會摔跤的招數，也許你能在這上面贏過它。

sentences.english: The first tyrannosaurs was an animal called Alectorsaurs.
sentences.chinese: 最早的霸王龍是一種被叫做‘五彩冠龍’的動物。

sentences.english: This soft substance may very well represent the remains of the actual blood vessels of T. rex.
sentences.chinese: 這些柔軟的物質可能是霸王龍真正血管的遺留痕跡。

definition: to murder without blinking an eye (idiom)/ruthless/cold-blooded
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
to have no sense of shame/brazen
